TextLibrary.Text: You have failed to defeat the thief and reclaim Patches treasure.
Patch rewards you for helping to reclaim his treasure.
You must follow the tracks to the Pike to track down the thief who stole Patch's treasure.
You must follow the tracks to Tusk to track down the thief who stole Patch's treasure.
You must follow the tracks to Weret to track down the thief who stole Patch's treasure.
